Sentence: Chanting, the choir raised the volume as the celebrant intoned the prayer.

Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script):

Sentence: One should read G. V. Carey’s chapter ‘Proof Correction’ in Mind the Stop.
Response:
Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script): 

एका वाचा जे. व्ही. केरी यांच्या प्रूफ कोरेक्शन ह्या शीर्षकाचे अध्याय ‘माइंड द स्टॉप’ मध्ये

Sentence: The glass content of this material is low, (10% by weight), for this application.
Response:
Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script): 

वस्तूच्या या सामग्रीचा ग्लासचा प्रमाण  कमी आहे (वजनानुसार 10%), या वापरासाठी.

Sentence: During the experiment, the animals will be fed with water, (via an automatic system), ad libitum.
Response:
Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script): 
प्रयोगाच्या काळात, प्राण्यांना पाण्याने (अत्याधुनिक प्रणालीवरून) अन्न दिले जाईल, ad libitum.

Sentence: a water/glycol ratio of 60/40 is preferred.
Response:
Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script): 

जल/ग्लायकोलच्या प्रमाणात 60/40 या प्रमाणात प्राधान्य दिले जाते.

Sentence: It has thickness of only 16/240 inch.
Response: Marathi Translation (Devanagari Script): त्याची मात्रा फक्त 16/240 इंच.
